kb:meta.kb:creator: Karsten Reincke
Marco Juliano
kb:meta.kb:description: A reference knowledge base for testing the psiKeds inference machine
Domain: Convey a correctly packed and stamped German C4/C5/C56/C6 letter

kb:sensor.kb:label: Color-Names
kb:sensor.kb:description: perceptible colors denoted by their names

kb:sensor.kb:label: Paper-Thickness
kb:sensor.kb:description: thickness of paper as one criteria of paper quality

kb:sensor.kb:label: Din-A-Numbers
kb:sensor.kb:description: sensor to perceive Din A Format Numbers

kb:sensor.kb:label: Din-C-Numbers
kb:sensor.kb:description: sensor to perceive Din C Format Numbers

kb:sensor.kb:label: Din-Format-Height
kb:sensor.kb:description: DIN form based heights of paper sizes: DIN-A as portrait (height > width ) DIN-C as landscape (width > height)

kb:sensor.kb:label: Din-Format-Width
kb:sensor.kb:description: DIN form based widths of paper sizes: DIN-A as portrait (height > width ) DIN-C as landscape (width > height)

kb:sensor.kb:label: count-sectors
kb:sensor.kb:description: counts the number of sections evoked by the folding method

kb:sensor.kb:label: weight
kb:sensor.kb:description: weight of an envelope or a paper page or both together

kb:concept.kb:label: Conveyable-DIN-A6-Writing-Card
kb:concept.kb:description: constitutive values for a conveyable DIN A6 writing card

kb:concept.kb:label: Conveyable-DIN-A6-Writing-Card
kb:concept.kb:description: constitutive values for an unconveyable DIN A6 writing card

kb:purpose.kb:label: inform-remote-addressee
kb:purpose.kb:description: something to inform a remote addressees

kb:purpose.kb:label: write-messages-on
kb:purpose.kb:description: something to write a messages on it

kb:purpose.kb:label: compress-message-media
kb:purpose.kb:description: something usable to compress the media containing the messages

kb:purpose.kb:label: protect-message-media
kb:purpose.kb:description: something usable to protect the media containing the messages

kb:purpose.kb:label: enable-message-transport
kb:purpose.kb:description: something usable to enable the transport of a protected message

kb:variant.kb:label: Compressed-Letter
kb:variant.kb:description: a letter containing a compressed media

kb:variant.kb:label: Uncompressed-Letter
kb:variant.kb:description: a letter containing an uncompressed media

kb:variant.kb:label: Envelope
kb:variant.kb:description: an envelope for protecting a written message

kb:variant.kb:label: WritingCard
kb:variant.kb:description: a card for writing a message

kb:variant.kb:label: Fold-Method-Half-in-Size
kb:variant.kb:description: a method to fold a piece of paper half in size

kb:variant.kb:label: Fold-Method-a-third-in-Size
kb:variant.kb:description: a method to fold a piece of paper a third in size

kb:variant.kb:label: Fold-Method-a-quarter-in-Size
kb:variant.kb:description: a method to fold a piece of paper a quarter in size

kb:variant.kb:label: Stamp
kb:variant.kb:description: a stamp indicating that the transport is paid

kb:data.kb:events:
postcard-itself-as-top-context
uncompressed-letter-itself-as-top-context
compressed-letter-itself-as-top-context
<kb:event id="writingCardAsPostcard" nexusId="Postcard context="Postcard fileMessages "> the-writing-card-as-a-postcard
using the writing card for filing the message of a postcard
<kb:event id="uncompressedLetterWithCardAsFileMedia" nexusId="UncompressedLetter context="UncompressedLetter fileMessages "> the-writing-card-used-as-uncompressed-letter-media
using the writing card for filing the message of an uncompressed letter
<kb:event id="compressedLetterWithPaper" nexusId="CompressedLetter context="CompressedLetter fileMessages "> the-compressed-letter-written-on-paper
<kb:event id="compressedLetterFoldHalfInSize" nexusId="CompressedLetter context="CompressedLetter compressMessageMedia "> compressed-letter-using-the-half-in-size-folding-method
<kb:event id="compressedLetterFoldThirdInSize" nexusId="CompressedLetter context="CompressedLetter compressMessageMedia "> compressed-letter-using-the-third-in-size-folding-method
<kb:event id="compressedLetterFoldQuarterInSize" nexusId="CompressedLetter context="CompressedLetter compressMessageMedia "> compressed-letter-using-the-quarter-in-size-folding-method
preprinted-address-area-on-writing-card-as-postcard
writing card with preprinted address area being used as postcard
an-uncompressed-letter-with-a-writing-card-without-addr-field
no preprinted address area on a writing card used as uncompressed letter
045-cent-stamp-as-postcard-transport-enabler
45 cent stamp for enabling the transport of a postcard
uncompressed-letter-stamp-with-value-60
uncompressed-letter-stamp-with-value-60
compressed-letter-with-DIN-A2-paper
DIN-A2 paper in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-with-DIN-A3-paper
DIN-A3 paper in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-with-DIN-A4-paper
DIN-A4 paper in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-with-DIN-A5-paper
DIN-A5 paper in the context of a compressed letter
uncompressed-letter-stamp-with-value-60
uncompressed-letter-stamp-with-value-145
uncompressed-Din-C6-Letter
a typical DIN C6 Letter denoted by its Din-Number
uncompressed-Din-C4-Letter
a typical DIN C4 Letter denoted by the Din-Number of the envelope
compressed-letter-with-DIN-C4-envelope
DIN-C4 envelope in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-with-DIN-C5-envelope
DIN-C5 envelope in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-with-DIN-C56-envelope
DIN-C56 envelope in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-without-DIN-C56-envelope
not using a DIN-C56 envelope in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-with-DIN-C6-envelope
DIN-C6 envelope in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-letter-without-DIN-C6-envelope
not using a DIN-C6 envelope in the context of a compressed letter
compressed-Din-C6-Letter
a typical compressed DIN C6 Letter denoted by its Din-Number
compressed-Din-C56-Letter
a typical compressed DIN C56 Letter denoted by its Din-Number
compressed-Din-C5-Letter
a typical compressed DIN C5 Letter denoted by its Din-Number
compressed-Din-C4-Letter
a typical compressed DIN C4 Letter denoted by its Din-Number
uncompressed-letter-in-a-DIN-C6-envelope
uncompressed-Din-C5-Letter
a typical DIN C5 Letter denoted by the concept of all DIN-C6-features of its envelope

kb:parameter.kb:label: uncompressed-letter-din-size
kb:parameter.kb:description: the size of an uncompressed letter itself

kb:parameter.kb:label: uncompressed-letter-color
kb:parameter.kb:description: the color of an uncompressed letter itself

kb:parameter.kb:label: compressed-letter-envelope-color
kb:parameter.kb:description: the color of the envelope of a compressed

kb:parameter.kb:label: compressed-letter-din-size
kb:parameter.kb:description: the size of the compressed letter itself

kb:parameter.kb:label: compressed-letter-color
kb:parameter.kb:description: the color of the compressed letter itself

kb:parameter.kb:label: compressed-letter-paper-size
kb:parameter.kb:description: size of the paper in the context of a compressed letter

kb:parameter.kb:label: compressed-letter-envelope-size
kb:parameter.kb:description: size of the envelope in the context of a compressed letter

kb:rule.kb:label: postcard=>use-writing-card
kb:rule.kb:description: Rule 1.A: a postcard must be written on a writing card

kb:rule.kb:label: postcard=>use-writing-card-with-preprinted-address-field
kb:rule.kb:description: Rule 1.B: a postcard must be written on a writing card with preprinted address field

kb:rule.kb:label: compressed-letter=>use-paper
kb:rule.kb:description: Rule 3.A: foldable letters must be written on paper
